arts.ttl: Bayern Munich Predicted Line-up vs Hoffenheim: One forced change
arts.sum: Vincent Kompany will be forced into one change when his Bayern Munich side travel to Sinsheim to face Hoffenheim in the Bundesliga on Saturday afternoon. Josip Stanišić suffered a partial…

arts.ttl: "They'll be thinking that this is the moment" – Kompany wary of underestimating Hoffenheim
